name: Benzonatate

indications.text: benzonatate capsules , usp indicated symptomatic relief cough .

contraindications.text: adults children 10 years age : usual dose one 100 mg 200 mg capsule three times day needed cough . necessary control cough , 600 mg daily three divided doses may given . benzonatate capsules swallowed whole.benzonatate capsules broken , chewed , dissolved , cut crushed .

warningsAndPrecautions: benzonatate capsules usp , 200 mg clear yellow , oval-shaped softgel capsules imprinted “ pc15 ” supplied follows : ndc : 70518-2491-00 ndc : 70518-2491-01 ndc : 70518-2491-02 ndc : 70518-2491-03 packaging : 30 1 bottle plastic packaging : 30 1 blister pack packaging : 21 1 bottle plastic packaging : 30 1 bottle plastic store 20˚ 25˚ c ( 68˚ 77˚ f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . protect light dispense tight ( usp ) , child-resistant containers . rx repackaged distributed : remedy repack , inc. 625 kolter dr. suite # 4 indiana , pa 1-724-465-8762
indications_original: Benzonatate capsules, USP are indicated for the symptomatic relief of cough.
contraindications_original:
Adults and Children over 10 years of age: Usual dose is one 100 mg or 200 mg capsule three times a day as needed for cough. If necessary to control cough, up to 600 mg daily in three divided doses may be given.
 
  Benzonatate capsules should be swallowed whole.Benzonatate capsules are not to be broken, chewed, dissolved, cut or crushed.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Benzonatate Capsules USP, 200 mg are clear yellow, oval-shaped softgel capsules imprinted with “PC15” and are supplied as follows:
                  
                  NDC: 70518-2491-00
                  NDC: 70518-2491-01
                  NDC: 70518-2491-02
                  NDC: 70518-2491-03
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BLISTER PACK
                  PACKAGING: 21 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  
                  Store at 20˚ to 25˚ C (68˚ to 77˚ F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  PROTECT FROM LIGHT
                  Dispense in tight (USP), child-resistant containers.
                  Rx Only
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
                  Remedy Repack, Inc.
                  625 Kolter Dr. Suite #4 Indiana, PA 1-724-465-8762
adverseReactions_original: Hypersensitivity to benzonatate or related compounds.
